sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Home() { const issues = [ { title: "School Infrastructure Issues", description: "Many schools in rural Bangladesh lack proper infrastructure.", upvotes: 50, downvotes: 10, comments: 3, location: "Dhaka", image: "https://www.unicef.org/bangladesh/sites/unicef.org.bangladesh/files/styles/hero_desktop/public/UN0743047.jpg.webp", }, { title: "Healthcare Access", description: "Rural areas often face a shortage of healthcare facilities.", upvotes: 120, downvotes: 15, comments: 10, location: "Chattogram", image: "https://via.placeholder.com/150", }, { title: "Road Safety", description: "Improperly maintained roads cause frequent accidents.", upvotes: 75, downvotes: 20, comments: 8, location: "Sylhet", image: "https://via.placeholder.com/150", }, ]; return (

Current Issues

{issues.map((issue, index) => (

{issue.title}

{issue.description}

))}
); } export default CurrentIssues;
